Dead by Daylight is a 1 versus 4 multiplayer horror survival game with cross platform capabilities. You take on the side of the Killer or the one of the 4 Survivors. As the Survivor, you work on generators to escape the map, dealing with any variety of supernatural killers and the tricks they have at their disposal.

the game i bought to the game now, is nothing like i paid for.  the killers are all over powered so the survivors make it through the gate less for the win.  the killers run a whole step or two faster than you.  the buttons to hit to break free are A and D.  which makes it really hard to break free and more times than not.. you get hung!  then if you DC there is a penalty that starts out at 2.5 minutes and goes up each time this is done.  not only that but if the killer dc's at the start, you get time out also for nothing.  Face Camped and Camped and proximity watched to keep hanging you all three times for the win. the end game used to let you try to unhook yourself.  now, if you are the last one you die at being hanged instantly.  also, you have so much time to get a gate open because once the hatch is closed, the timer starts and you have very little time to open it and get out.  the gates are so close that the killer can easily navigate back and forth to the gates and more than likely you will not make it.  Survivor's to make it out is roughly 1 out of 10 times.  NOPE! will not lol.. is there a game that no one will cheat you on?  if it is not the players.. it is the programmers that cheat you.  it is sad but other than that, if the programmers would leave it alone, it might be a really good game.

I always come back and leave because of have repetitive the game is and how toxic the community showcases itself, but man i turn into one hell of a sweat whenever i hop back on and get that dose of nostalgia slapped onto my face. I hopped over from Ps4 to pc some time ago and i have to say, pc DBD is a lot faster both in game and with its wait times. Ranking up is pretty pointless unless you want to faces tryhards literally every game, besides that, the game is really well made and thought through and i'm surprised they continue to update it as often as they do. Its full of bugs glitches and flat out nuisances but hey that what makes DBD so special in our hearts. 10/10

great game, fair few bugs. Very much a game based heavily on teamwork and survival. The game does appear to have issues with lag and the occasional disconnection but that's to be expected. Full controller support and ability to change settings which is great for those who have played console and what not, also supports cross platform meaning you are able to connect to players everywhere except mobile.
es buen juego compralo

i loved this game, for a long time, from the day it came out right untill they started giving "penalties" for disconnection, now here is my issue with this system of "fixing" disconnecting team mates, ive had my share of killers abusing the slug mechanic and downing everyone and leaving you there to bleed out, now i get its part of the game, i get you can report them for that but what does any of that resolve? nothing, they dont give a crap about the mechanics of this game only pumping killers and making it one sided, now im by no means a shitty player, but a....i dunno, speed up bleedout button would be great to avoid this, or, remove the dumbass penalties altogether. lose internet 4 minutes, play during a storm? 15 minute penalty...makes sense right? graphics, gameplay mostly great tbh, but that one mechanic ruins it for me indefinately, fic. your. shit.
